text: typedef unsigned uint ; int main ( ) { uint t = 0 , lines = 0 , entry = 0 , max = 0 ; uint i = 0 , j = 0 ; uint * arr = NULL , * tmp = NULL , * tmp2 = NULL ; scanf ( "%u" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%u" , & lines ) ; arr = ( uint * ) calloc ( lines + 2 , sizeof ( uint ) ) ; max = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= lines ; i ++ ) { tmp = arr + lines - i ; tmp2 = arr + lines - i + 1 ; for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%u" , & entry ) ; if ( j == 1 ) { * tmp = * tmp2 + entry ; } else { if ( * tmp2 > * ( tmp2 + 1 ) ) { * tmp = * tmp2 + entry ; } else { * tmp = * ( tmp2 + 1 ) + entry ; } tmp2 ++ ; } if ( i == lines && max < * tmp ) { max = * tmp ; } tmp ++ ; } } printf ( "%u\n" , max ) ; free ( arr ) ; } return 0 ; }
